title: Jealousy
description: The next chapter in the thrilling Thief of Life series: the Chronicles of Daniela. Haunted by terrifying visions of the cruel killer who nearly claimed her life, Daniela struggles to decipher reality from fiction. One man has pledged his love to her, but if he is not cautious it could prove fatal. Though he’s found a loophole for safety, it proves very strenuous and can’t be relied on for long. Because of this, Daniela’s emotional state begins to change and she becomes determined to regain her independence. At the same time she is suddenly stricken with flashes of pain—Jealousy, but not her own. Daniela is willing to love, but can she choose between so many? One man’s inability to concede to Daniela along with her stubbornness to choose one love could be the undoing of them all. With danger and seduction lurking around every corner, can true love conquer all, or will it be swallowed up in JEALOUSY?
author: Christi Anna
